content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to set reminders or have access to your personal calendar. But I can definitely help you plan out your day and provide you with a suggestion on how to set a reminder.

Here's a suggested reminder you can set for yourself:

**Wednesday Breakfast Meeting Reminder**

* Set a recurring reminder for every Wednesday at 7:30 AM (or 15-30 minutes before your bus arrives) to remind you to catch the 8:00 AM bus.
* Set another reminder for 8:20 AM to remind you to arrive at the meeting location on time for your 8:30 AM breakfast meeting.

You can set these reminders on your phone, calendar, or planner, whichever method works best for you!

Remember to adjust the reminder times according to your personal preferences and schedule.
